title: Unbelievable video shows Tesla electric semitruck challenging diesel 18-wheeler to a race on highway — see who won
full_text: Unbelievable video shows Tesla electric semitruck challenging diesel 18-wheeler to a race on highway — see who won. Conventional trucks are so slow, they can block other motorists from passing and slow down the speed of traffic.. Photo Credit: @HinrichsZane / Twitter So far, electric vehicle giant Tesla has focused on developing the next generation of passenger vehicles. But, a video released on Twitter shows the power and c… [+1973 chars]
